price: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Mu by’ukuri Nyagasani wanjye yohereza (ubutumwa) bw’ukuri. Ni Umumenyi uhebuje w’ibyihishe.”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yaqdhifu bil-ḥaqi ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
